publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1199# Pauline McNeill: Breast Cancer Awareness—That the Parliament notes that October is Breast Cancer Awareness month and undertakes to do all it can to raise awareness of breast cancer throughout Scotland during this period.
S1M-1199# Breast Cancer Awareness (lodged on 20 September 2000) David Mundell*, Tommy Sheridan*
